content: @Alec Leamas @Mike Rossiter @Jon So we can stay current. Thanks.

I am just updating FE2 to use the same xcode environment that shipdriver does for macox universal builds. Looking at circleci they still seem to be suggesting that xcode "14.2" is the "current" mainline version, whilst shipdriver is using "15.2.0" which seems to be a "beta" version.

The second macos build was left there for legacy OCPN 5.6.2 . Can we now get rid of this as it was frozen 18/10/23?
